titles.title: Hosanna, Hosanna, Hosanna in the Highest

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: // Hosanna, hosanna, hosanna in the highest! //

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord we lift up Your name,
With hearts full of praise,
Be exalted, O Lord, our God,
Hosanna in the highest!

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: // Glory, glory, glory to the King of Kings! //

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord we lift up Your name,
With hearts full of praise,
Be exalted, O Lord, our God,
Glory to the King of Kings!
